name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobalytics - ATS Resume Checker and Keyword Analyzer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobalytics improves your resume with our Resume Keyword Analyzer and Checker. Match job descriptions and stand out to employers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Jobmatch - the ultimate tool to boost your job search success! Jobmatch is your personal resume enhancer, designed to help you beat those tricky Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) that sift through resumes before they reach human eyes. With the power of artificial intelligence, Jobmatch strategically tailors your resume to match the specific job listing you're eyeing, making you stand out as the perfect candidate for the role.

How does it work? It's simple!

Features:

1. Match Score: Receive an instant match score ranging from 0-100, indicating how well your resume aligns with the job description. This handy feature saves you heaps of time by pinpointing the most relevant job openings for you to focus on, ensuring your efforts are directed towards the best opportunities.

2. Keyword Analysis: Identify all the crucial keywords from the job description that are missing in your resume. By incorporating these keywords, you significantly increase your chances of passing through ATS filters and catching the attention of recruiters.

Ready to level up your job hunt effortlessly with Jobalytics. Best of all, it's 100% free and supports compatibility with mainstream job websites. For inquiries or feedback regarding support for other websites, please contact us at hello@jobmatch.ing.

By using this extension, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
